name: @oceanprotocol/keeper-contracts
description: Integration of TCRs, CPM and Ocean Tokens in Solidity

scripts.deploy:development: export NETWORK=development&&npm run deploy -- --network development --testnet true
scripts.deploy:spree: export NETWORK=spree&&npm run deploy -- --network spree --testnet true
scripts.deploy:duero: export NETWORK=duero&&npm run deploy -- --network duero --testnet true
scripts.deploy:nile: export NETWORK=nile&&npm run deploy -- --network nile --testnet true
scripts.deploy:kovan: export NETWORK=kovan&&npm run deploy -- --network kovan --testnet true
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: export NETWORK=rinkeby&&npm run deploy -- --network rinkeby --testnet true
scripts.upgrade:development: export NETWORK=development&&npm run upgrade -- --network development --testnet true
scripts.upgrade:spree: export NETWORK=spree&&npm run upgrade -- --network spree --testnet true
scripts.upgrade:duero: export NETWORK=duero&&npm run upgrade -- --network duero --testnet true
scripts.upgrade:nile: export NETWORK=nile&&npm run upgrade -- --network nile --testnet true
scripts.upgrade:kovan: export NETWORK=kovan&&npm run upgrade -- --network kovan --testnet true
scripts.upgrade:rinkeby: export NETWORK=rinkeby&&npm run upgrade -- --network rinkeby --testnet true
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:coverage && npm run clean:zos
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:ethlint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:eslint -- --fix && npm run lint:ethlint -- --fix
scripts.security:mythril: truffle compile && myth -x --truffle --max-depth 12 --outform markdown 2>&1 | tee mythrilReport.md

author: Ocean Protocol
